snippet: With its acquisition of Getty Images, the private equity firm Carlyle Group has completed 19 deals worth more than $14 billion over the past year.
abstract: With its acquisition of Getty Images, the private equity firm Carlyle Group has completed 19 deals worth more than $14 billion over the past year.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Carlyle Group Continues an Unusually Busy Summer
headline.print_headline: Private Equity Firm Continues Its Busy Summer for Deals
